#summary Pre-alpha release of Sariac Download Manager
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

A Pre-alpha Sariac have been released.


= Details =

This is a pre-alpha. Many features have not implemented yet. There are also many bugs present. Please test and Give Feedback.

= Feedback =

Please give your feedback in my email or by commenting in this page.

I am asking you to suggest anything from GUI to codebase. 

If you are submitting a bug please include the log file which is situated in *.sariac/log* folder in your home directory.
